document_data.name: Guldagh Ironfist
document_data.mainbody: '''Guldagh Ironfist''' was one of the top independent [[incense]] traders in [[Anauroch]].
document_data.Activities: Guldagh was a notorious thug. Usually, he recruited criminals in [[Westgate]]'s dirtiest alleys and  marched them over [[Cormyr]] and [[Sembia]] until they arrived in Anauroch, where they thieved incense from the [[D'tarig]]'s territory. Afterwards, Guldagh traded the incense with other merchants before returning. If followed by some enemies, Guldagh entered the [[Stonelands]], where rumors said he had a secret fortress.
